GoodieHutType.Name: Snow Giant Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: A group of Snow Giants have taken up residence here.

Treasure.Title: Snow Giant Lair
Treasure.Desc: A Snow Giant clan resides here. They humbly offer their services if you wold establish a camp.

GoodieHutType.Name: Elder Snow Giant Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: A large group of Snow Giants have taken up residence here.

Treasure.Title: Snow Giant Lair
Treasure.Desc: A Snow Giant clan resides here. They humbly offer their services if you wold establish a camp.

GoodieHutType.Name: Frostling Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A frostling rider has setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the frostling rider's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition.

GoodieHutType.Name: Frostling Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A large group of frostlings riders have setup a camp here.

Treasure.Title: Found Item
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the frostling rider's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition.

GoodieHutType.Name: Frostling Shaman's Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A single figure bows low before the flickering firelight, chanting softly to himself.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the frostling shaman's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Frostling Shaman's Tent
GoodieHutType.Description: A single figure bows low before the flickering firelight, chanting softly to himself.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: Though most of the frostling shaman's equipment is unusable, you do find one item in good condition. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Young Forest Guardian Grove
GoodieHutType.Description: A Young Forest Guardian protects this area.

Treasure.Title: Forest Guardians
Treasure.Desc: Forest Guardians reside here. They agree to join your cause if you establish a Sacred Grove and help protect the area.

GoodieHutType.Name: Forest Guardian Grove
GoodieHutType.Description: A Forest Guardian protects this area.

Treasure.Title: Forest Guardians
Treasure.Desc: Forest Guardians reside here. They agree to join your cause if you establish a Sacred Grove and help protect the area.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ancient Forest Guardian Grove
GoodieHutType.Description: An Ancient Forest Guardian protects this area.

Treasure.Title: Forest Guardians
Treasure.Desc: Forest Guardians reside here. They agree to join your cause if you establish a Sacred Grove and help protect the area.

GoodieHutType.Name: Yerba Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A Yerba has taken up residence here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Yerba
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Yerba. Searching the cave you find an item of some value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Yerba Camp
GoodieHutType.Description: A Yerba and some Wildlings has taken up residence here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Yerba
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Yerba. Searching the cave you find an item of some value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Iron Brotherhood Outpost
GoodieHutType.Description: This outpost is a hideout for the Iron Brotherhood. This organization preys on isolated settlements for food, gildar, and other resources.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The outpost contains a chest, within the chest you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Iron Brotherhood Base
GoodieHutType.Description: This is one of the headquarters for the group of thugs known as the Iron Brotherhood. They prey on the weak and isolated settlements across the land.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the stronghold you find something... interesting. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Black Hand Outpost
GoodieHutType.Description: This outpost is a hideout for the Black Hand. This organization preys on isolated settlements for food, gildar, and other resources.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The outpost contains a chest, within the chest you find an item. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Black Hand Stronghold
GoodieHutType.Description: This is one of the headquarters for the group of thugs known as the Iron Brotherhood. They prey on the weak and isolated settlements across the land.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the stronghold you find something... interesting. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Black Hand Fortress
GoodieHutType.Description: This is home to the leaders of the criminal organization known as the Black Hand. From this position, the Black Hand directs their followers to ravage the countryside for money, resources and slaves.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: In the remains of the stronghold you find something... interesting. (+1 Fame)

GoodieHutType.Name: Ghoul Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Ghouls have taken up residence here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Ghoul
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Ghoul. Searching the lair you find an item of some value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Ghoul Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: Ghouls have taken up residence here.

Treasure.Title: Defeated Ghul
Treasure.Desc: You have defeated the Ghul. Searching the lair you find an item of some value.

GoodieHutType.Name: Jungle Weaver Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: This dense forest is home to a cluster of Jungle Weavers.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The spider was nesting over what you first assume is a clutch of spider eggs. When you cut away the webbing you discover an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Jungle Weaver Lair
GoodieHutType.Description: This dense forest is home to a cluster of Jungle Weavers.

Treasure.Title: Lair Cleared
Treasure.Desc: The spider was nesting over what you first assume is a clutch of spider eggs. When you cut away the webbing you discover an item.

GoodieHutType.Name: Equipment Cache
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lies a stack of crates bearing the insignia of the Free Riders, those fierce, unforgiving warriors who roam the wastelands, determined to bring order to chaos.

Treasure.Title: Found Gildar!
Treasure.Desc: Opening the chest you find it is full of gold, finders keepers! (+280 Gold)

GoodieHutType.Name: Abandoned Caravan
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lie the wreckage of several wagons... splintered wood lies scattered across the ground... a few canvas bags can be seen as well... and there are, of course, several corpses.

Treasure.Title: Found Gems!
Treasure.Desc: Opening the chest you find it contains valuable gems.

GoodieHutType.Name: Wooden Crates
Lost Goods
Misplaced Wares
Forgotten Goods
GoodieHutType.Description: Crates lie beneath a handful of rotting tree limbs. They are coated by a thick layer of dust and crawling insects, who have staked a claim to whatever treasures these crates contain.

Treasure.Title: Found Gems!
Treasure.Desc: Opening the chest you find it contains valuable gems.

GoodieHutType.Name: Treasure Chest
GoodieHutType.Description: Here lies a crate of polished hardwood, a crate stamped in red ink with the seal of the Merchants Guild... a crate whose treasures wait to be revealed.

Treasure.Title: Found Gems!
Treasure.Desc: Opening the chest you find it contains valuable gems.
